mapper.select: SELECT BDATE , NVL(COUNT(*), 0) cnt FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN age < 20 THEN 'map1' WHEN age >= 20 AND age < 30 THEN 'map2' WHEN age >= 30 AND age < 40 THEN 'map3' WHEN age >= 40 AND age < 50 THEN 'map4' WHEN age >= 50 AND age < 60 THEN 'map5' WHEN age >= 60 THEN 'map6' END BDATE FROM (SELECT TRUNC((TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') - SUBSTR(BDATE,1,4))) age FROM ALL_MEMBER ) ) GROUP BY BDATE ORDER BY BDATE
